Avni has a few modes of data entry. 
1. Field app (Android app)
2. Data Entry App (Browser based app)
If that particular question mandatorly needs to be answered without which you cannot save the form. If Mandatory is No user can save the form without filling the details

Indicates whether a question must be answered before the form can be saved.

If Mandatory = Yes, the user cannot save the form without filling in this field.

If Mandatory = No, the user can save the form even if the field is left blank.

Include any field-level conditions, validations, or rules.
Examples:

“Show this field only if Gender = Female”

“Mandatory if age < 5 years”
